title: How to Make Low Fat Hummus

steps.headline: Chop half a medium yellow onion.
Mash chickpeas by hand or in food processor.
Add onions and garlic to chickpea mash.
steps.description: Add lite "Apple-style-Italian salad dressing, rosemary, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine.

steps.headline: Add the zest and juice of one lime or lemon.
Add a quarter eating teaspoon of French mustard.
Spread on bread and eat as is, add sandwich meats, or use as a dip for chips or vegetables.

text: Chop half a medium yellow onion.  Finely chop four cloves garlic.  Mash chickpeas by hand or in food processor.  Add onions and garlic to chickpea mash. Add lite "Apple-style-Italian salad dressing, rosemary, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine. Add the zest and juice of one lime or lemon.  Add a quarter eating teaspoon of French mustard.  Mix well. Chill. Spread on bread and eat as is, add sandwich meats, or use as a dip for chips or vegetables.  Finished.
